categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Delta Base was a remote Rebel base on New Kisge, the eighth moon of Chaasch in Suolriep sector. It was established by General Vanden Willard, with Lieutenant Tole Warren as one of his top officers.
It was named because of famed Delta Unit, from Scandium Team.

Rebels Mors Odrion and Rekara were assigned to Delta Base soon after the Battle of Yavin. Former Scandium Team leader Harovan Toth also went to Delta Base after semi-retiring, to work as patrol pilot. After the Battle of Endor, Tal-Yannar Najjan was assigned as a medic to this base.
